website_summaries.verdict: Some dogs prefer softness over support while they rest, and the Armakat Pet Bed Mat excels in softness. We recommend it for healthier or younger dogs who don't require orthopedic support.
pros: Canvas outer shell has a skid-proof base for improved safety
Soft plush inner layer more comfortable than memory foam
Extra large mattress can handle larger breeds
cons: Soft interior layer is not as supportive as therapeutic or orthopedic models
Urine and other fluids soak through unprotected cushion

customer_reviews.title: I have three GSD and all of them love it so I am going to buy another one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 yrs. old GSD, but my 8 month old GSD has clamed it. I have three GSD and all of them love it so I am going to buy another one for my pack. Yes another one and more than likely two so all can have there own.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Futrell

customer_reviews.title: Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: Our 72lb lab and 2 cats use it at the same time and there is still room to spare. Easy to put together. Yes you can see there are 3 distinct lines from the pillows but the dog and cats have not complained like some of your idiotic customers have. Jesus it's a dog bed not a honeymoon suite.
customer_reviews.author: JimN

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, and my dogs loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old lab mix and he loves this bed. It is large enough for him to spread himself out and sleep comfortable along with my 2 chihuahuas. They all love it. I sat on it myself and it is quite soft and comfortable. It has a fair amount of stuffing in it. Definitely recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our great dane!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the first amazon reveiw I've ever written. We received this bed today with 2 day shipping. My 3 year old great Dane climbed right in and has been asleep since. There is more than enough room for her. It's large, the top is made of a super soft material. It's nice and thick, easy to clean, and it matches our bedroom. I am sure she will sleep great tonight. For the price this is the best bed I have found!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Schwander

customer_reviews.title: My Dog sank straight to the ground. DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely say, this bed is huge but I have a 70 pound lab who has severe hip dysplacia and arthritis. She sank right to the floor. The bed has hardly any stuffing in it. I had ordered two of them and was only able to return one in the unopened box. I stayed with the other one because I had her lay on it and I didn't think it would be appropriate to send something like that back. Totally regret it. Spent that money and ended up getting a better bed for less. The bed is in the garage now collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this "pillow"
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this "pillow". Will not give my Irish wolfhound any support at all. Getting it out of the two sizes too small box was a nightmare. The bed does not fit the cover at all. Looks like a sad lumpy sack. Sent back immediately and ordered a better one. At least the seller did give me a full refund including postage.
customer_reviews.author: nowhavethreebears

customer_reviews.title: Stood the test of time and everything else a Saint Bernard can do to it.
customer_reviews.text: 2 years since we got it!! First and foremost the extra large size of this bed was the deal maker for our St. Bernard. The extra thickness was another bonus! It cleans up great in the machine I've bleached it a few times because Saint Bernards are as messy as they come and it held up beautiful other than the burgundy perimeter fading slightly. Though the inside isn't memory foam it still has held up great under constant use. Our Saint runs to it anxiously when he sees it and sprawls right out on it. It is water resistant as well. We love it and will buy another when needed
customer_reviews.author: hikn2peak

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 110 pound dog with room to spare!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bed! Good quality product. My Great Pyrenees fits on it with room to spare for a grand kid. It's soft and comfortable, it always washes up really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Grace D

customer_reviews.title: The surface is super fluffy and soft
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely LOVES this bed. The surface is super fluffy and soft. It's made of high quality materials. The cover is easily removable and easy to wash (just throw in the washing machine and dryer) We have another, bigger, bed right next to this one for our other dog who almost never uses it because he prefers the floor. She used to lie in it but doesn't even bother with it anymore ever since got this one. If she's in the house and not in our bedroom or outside, on this bed is where she is.
customer_reviews.author: prangel

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not certain why this bed has these many good reviews, but is not cushy at all, just pushing down on it with my hand I could feel the floor below, it never expanded to 7 inches (after 2 hours) and the medium size we ordered is actually 2 halves saw together on the inside, this detail was omitted in the description, sorry to say but not a good quality bed, sent back even before neither one of our dogs laid on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - microfiber pollution garbage quality
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed seems great until you try to wash it, then you're in micro fiber hell with tiny threads of plastic covering everything and floating through the air you breathe. After washing, the entire bed was white with loose fibers and just by handling it for a moment my clothes were completely covered. We all know by now that micro fiber plastic is dangerous and a huge environmental problem. Don't buy this cheaply made product - the materials are junk. The pillow is also extremely cheap, covered in the same fake fabric they use on disposable airline pillows. How much more cheap Chinese plastic junk can the world take? Ban this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bell Ringer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 200 pound English Mastiff and a 60 pound Rottweiler mix. I have to say they both now love the bed but it took a little getting used to. The English Mastiff is afraid of everything including his own shadow so the crinkling noise this bed makes when they first step on it makes him a little nervous. He is laying on it more now since he has gotten used to it though. The size is terrific for the price. It does look fluffier in the picture than it is when the dogs get on it. It squishes down quite a bit but my kids even tried it and said it still feels nice and soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it is XXL for sure!
customer_reviews.text: We got the XXL for our Great Dane who weighs close to 175 pounds and is over 5 feet long when laying down. This is a huge bed. Plenty big enough for him and our 2 little dogs all at the same time! It takes up huge area of our living room but we still have enough room to walk around it...barely. He loves it. He can stretch out and not fall off. He used to sleep on our couch until he absolutely ruined it with drool! I would buy this again but might go with the one just smaller than this one. The XL maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Dix2U

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat really seems to love it. It's well-made, and the top is a very soft faux fine fur. She was a little freaked out by the sensation of walking on it at first. It acts more like a balloon than a mattress. But she got used to it pretty quick, and now is on it all the time. I got the small one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This pet bed has a loud crinkly noise when a pet steps on it. That sound totally unnerved my dog and he would have nothing to do with it. If you put the waterproof side next to the floor ( not recommended by the directions), it makes a little less noise. When I tried to wash the pillow pad inside to soften it, the material covering the fiberfill got shredded. That did reduce the noise. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a large crate
customer_reviews.text: this bed has a really soft fur top and i love that the pillow is water proof. being able to wash the cover will be a lifesaver too. I wish it came in more colors, but the burgundy outside is nice. this is the perfect size for the crate, which is why we bought it. It does have the no-slip grip on the bottom, which doesn't matter for us in the crate but would be perfect for our hardwood floors. Gronk approves!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Durable and thick
customer_reviews.text: I got the 42" for my Staffordshire Terrier. Its supersized I could have gotten the next size down, but its big and he has tons of room to stretch out. Its thick and durable. He love his bed and he doesn't even try to fluff it up with his paws like he did with his old bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Doggie Bed
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace an older bed for our 125lb. Akita. He got right on it and snuggled. We have an extra-large memory foam bed that our 65lb. Lab loves. Neither the Akita or our 90lb German Shepherd care for the memory foam bed. You can't beat this bed, especially for the money. A bed this large and supportive usually goes for at least 3-4 times the price. Assembly was very easy and completed in about 3 minutes from box to full bed. Our Akita and German Shepherd both give the Armarkat Bed a big four big paws up.
customer_reviews.author: JZ52

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bed - should have some limited instructions.
customer_reviews.text: So far like the dog beds. Not sure why the one slip cover is placed over the bag with the compressed padding. Also, did not realize that one side of he mattress is different. i.e. one bed made a sound when the dog walked on it. I noticed that one side is more like a mattress cover. I am sure to keep it clean. There should be instructions to list this. I cannot speak for how it will wear. If it breaks down quickly I will let you know. So far all the dogs from the 25 lb doxie mix to the 85lb golden mix to the 130 lb Great Danes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kozuch

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After more than 2 years it finally got worn out and dirty enough that it had to go. I reordered another just like it though. After two days without it the dogs(there are two now) were very excited to have the new one. Still highly recommend this. My dog has been sleeping on this now for almost a year. Have had no issues and have easily taken off the cover to wash it and put it back on several times. He is also a big chewer that likes to destroy beds but for whatever reason he has never chewed this one. It has now outlasted all his previous beds by 11 months.
customer_reviews.author: PharmD

customer_reviews.title: No Support
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I just got a defective bed, or they changed the design, but the bed I got has no support whatsoever. The size is perfect but it completely "deflates" when my dog lays on it, it has no support. He's basically laying on the floor. I added a crate bed into the cover to make it a little more firm and it seemed to help, but I still really don't like it. Disappointed. My dog basically scrunches it into a pillow, it doesn't hold it's shape. I guess I should have ordered something with foam.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very cushy, very soft outer. Inner liquid resistant side loud, reversible
customer_reviews.text: VERY cushy. Outer layer very soft. Waterproof inner (one side only fortunately) loud, dog hated it (is too). Also questionable effectiveness. Reversed inner mattress, solved. Siberian Husky growing to like it. It is so cushy & thick it will help dogs keep warmer (something our dog seldom needs) so he’s on/off of it regulating. Leg surgery so 1 bare leg, he’s appreciating the warmth & protection.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I thought I’d try another cheaper brand and hoped the quality would be as good. It was not and those beds both wore ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Armarkat customer since I bought my first dog his first bed (about 9 years ago). The prices are phenomenal for larger dogs (honestly, I rarely see their prices on x-large beds beat) and the quality is above-and-beyond. I’ve had one of the beds from this company since 9 years ago and it is still going strong! When we got a second dog a few years ago, I thought I’d try another cheaper brand and hoped the quality would be as good. It was not and those beds both wore out within 1-2 years. I’ll be sticking with Armarkat from now on for my dog beds.
customer_reviews.author: Srd186

customer_reviews.title: Our pup loved it - soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new puppy since he likes laying on pillows so much. I wish the maroon fabric part was a little tougher. Our pup is teething and so he chewed a small hole in a corner, but we sewed it up no problem. Laying a blanket over it and tucking it under helped deter chewing on the corners too. Our puppy loves this bed and seems calmwr and more content to be alone having this comfy bed for himself. We ended up buying a second smaller one for the bedroom too.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but needs 360 water proofing
customer_reviews.text: This bed is HUGE for an XL and both dogs love it! Very sof tand comfortable BUT the water proof pillow inside is only water proofed on one side. When our puppy peed on it (he is still potty training) it leaked off the outer part and absorbed into the side of the outer cushion which wet the pillow inside. We caught it right away so was a easy clean up, but this would be perfect if it was 360 water proof
customer_reviews.author: WinterHyena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all size dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two beds for three dogs. One if an English bulldog who weighs about 85 lbs. The other two are a pug and Boston terrier. Everyone is comfy and sleeps soundly in their beds. It is big enough for the bulldog and the other two have plenty of room to spread out and share their bed.
customer_reviews.author: K Lynn

customer_reviews.title: ... bed was durable and soft (only part I really liked about it)
customer_reviews.text: The outside cover of the bed was durable and soft (only part I really liked about it). Because this bed is large, it should be able to support the weight of a dog at least 40 lbs (my dog is only 30) and as soon as she layed on top, her elbows were touching the floor and she had zero cushion after that. The bed needs more filling in it. It would have been perfect but there was not enough filling! Sad it did not work out, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive for dogs with joint or weight issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the canvas (on the bottom) and the waterproof furry top... but sadly, it seems to be made of pillow stuffing and sinks right in the center...this is not good for overweight dogs who need orthopedic support. Overall, the bed is fluffy and soft for normal dogs who have no issue getting on or off.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS BED!!!! Got it for our 12 year old golden retriever. He has arthritis and needed a comfortable bed to sleep in. Our cats also LOVED it and wouldn't even get off of it when our dog wanted to sleep in it. :D The removable cover is so soft and it seems to bed very well made. Only complaint-The cover zipper could be a little longer to make it easier to get cushion inside of it. Took a minute to figure it out, but I love this bed so much I don't really care about the zipper. A low price for a quality item. Another great buy from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill G.

customer_reviews.title: No thin spots. Nice and dense!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the density of the pad and the cover has held up to some doggie tug of war. Purchased this to lessen our dog's hygroma issue. I would have preferred the plush fabric in a darker color. Let's face it, if you don't own a show dog it is going to show the dirt quickly. Also, something to keep in mind...the top of the mattress has a waterproofing fabric on the top. My dog thought it sounded like a big crinkle chew toy and it did take a little time before he'd lay down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Mattress too small for cover
customer_reviews.text: The dog bed cover is soft and cozy, and it seems that any dog should love that feeling. Unfortunately, our six-year-old Golden Retriever doesn't go near it, and that may be because the mattress inside the cover is much smaller than the cover itself - almost as though the wrong mattress size was paired with this cover. I purchased this bed specifically because it was supposed to be big enough for a dog her size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Caron

customer_reviews.title: Decent bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent bed for the price. As to the people complaining about the waterproof side making noise, they must have dog hearing themselves. It's a light rustle and if it bothers you that much you can just flip the padding over on the inside which completely eliminates the noise. The only thing I don't like about the bed is the padding is basically two, pillows if you will, sown together. This makes a small dent in the middle of the bed where the padding is very thin. Like I said very happy with it for the price even after washing it several times and my dog likes it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great bed and great size. Replacement covers available from Armarkat.
customer_reviews.text: We like this bed a lot. Moxie likes to lay on it and look out the front window. Maverick will lay on it with her. But when Maverick gets bored, and unattended, he chews on the corner. He has only done it twice in 2 years. I duct taped the small hole he put in the inner fill bag. Fortunately Armarkat sells the outside cover replacement on their website. The XL cover is $29 with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: James S. of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Design - it's actually TWO pillows, not one
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is actually two pillows, in separate pillow cases. The two pillow cases are then stitched together in the middle to make "one" big bed, which you put into the cover. Once assembled in the cover, the bed has a huge dip in the middle space where the two pillow cases are stitched together; this dip/space goes right to the floor. Terrible design. Returning for a bed with one pillow which is what I thought I was buying when I purchased this dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Nice, large, washable dog bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a bit more slippery than I expected, which I think is due to the waterproof lining on the inside "mattress" part of the bed. This was a challenge for my senior dog at first, but she has gotten used to it and navigates her bed without issue now. The waterproofing and removal, washable cover are the best parts about this bed. Incontinence had led me to wash this bed at least once a week. I'd be poor if I couldn't wash this bed — or my poor old girl wouldn't be as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Embriette Hyde

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!  BUY 2!
customer_reviews.text: SUPERB!!!! Unbelievably fantastic! I know, it's a doggie bed but this one takes top honors in every category! Nice and huge, for the back of our Volvo wagon, plush enough for me to want it on our own bed :), nice and deep too for three doggies to rest easily for car rides. And the Price! This bed is worth four times the price! We have gone through many a doggie beds and this one is unbeatable! I could go on and on but I will just say BUY IT! BUY 2!
customer_reviews.author: Renee A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: NEVER ENDING FUZZ!!!
customer_reviews.text: The white part on the cover is horrible when/after washing it. There is never ending fuzz everywhere, washing machine, dryer, even my full body was covered in the fuzz when I took them out, it gets all over everything inside/out side of the cover. The zipper was jammed with the fuzz after the very first wash (I followed the instruction to wash it with zipper closed, but the moment I unzip it the fuzz flew everywhere and jammed the zipper when I wanted to closed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Quality, heavy-duty bed. The cover is plush on top and durable on the sides with a skid-proof bottom which zips for cleaning. It comes with a plastic liner that you can put over the dense inside cushion for added protection (slobber if your dog chews his bone in bed like mine). My furry family prefers their Majestic Bagel Beds; however, during the summer a flat bed is key to staying cool and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: COBandMOB

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, Great price
customer_reviews.text: This bed was such a great price! I had to buy it for my new puppy. It’s a good size and easy to clean. The only thing I don’t love about it is that it’s not that supportive. It works for now because I have a puppy, but when she gets to be her full size, about 75lbs, I anticipate this bed won’t be supportive enough. That being said this has been a great bed for her as a puppy. Nice and large and such a great price! I’d recommend it for smaller dogs and puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The dog loves it, but...
customer_reviews.text: ... If you're expecting something memory foam or mattress-like, think again. The bed cover is really nice feeling, very premium. But the actual bed is so soft & squishy, my 43lb dog almost sinks to the floor. Maybe the purpose is to feel like the dog is in a cloud, bc my dog loved it from the 1st moment she was on. Just be aware that it is going to feel VERY soft. If you have a big +50lb dog, this may be a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Galão

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large Bed, Perfect For 135lb St. Bernard
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Still a great bed, my dogs sleep on it every day but it does get gross/fuzzy when you wash it. Maybe hand-wash and air dry? Not sure what the solution there is but we still are happy we bought it :) I have a 135 pound St Bernard/Great Pyrenees mix and a 80 pound Golden retriever. The first couple of days the St Bernard was suspicious of the new bed but after a couple of more days I found her sitting on it a lot. Both of my dogs love it and sit on it often. I should really buy another one :) Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for. My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got the small size bed to use as a portable, easy to carry extra bed for the car and for traveling. My 13yr old dog loves it. He will use it at home over his old, bigger, pillow type bed. I am going to order another one of these for the house and donate the other pillow bed I have now to a shelter. Be advised it does shed some. I washed it inside out with some old white towels. The white fuzz did get on the sides of the bed but it was easy to brush off. Not a deal breaker. Edit: I ordered the larger size to use in the bedroom and my cocker spaniel loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Trester

customer_reviews.title: Happy Puppy
customer_reviews.text: My year and a half old puppy enjoys this, its nice and plush but we noticed within the first week of ownership that it already had dents in it where she normally lays down. She lays in it at bedtime, sometimes curled in a ball, other times she will be half on half off. I gave it four stars because there was a tear in the seam near the zipper. Its purely cosmetic but it would have been too much of a hassle to get it back into the original containers and squished down to send back or exchange. I contacted Amazon about and they were able to help me out on pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Troublemaakerz

customer_reviews.title: All love for these beds
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad for the photos from the other reviews. Reading those responses helped me choose the right beds. The top is an extremely nice furry fur like a faux mink type of softness. My dogs are on the large size so I was concerned that maybe I needed the Jumbo. Nope! I LOVE THESE BEDS.....however......Judging from the picture, maybe I'm the only one who does. I truly think they rather have their raggedy blankets back because well you see where Worthington is, and my little girl is downstairs. Oh well......wait, wait, wait!!! Just as I type this, this just happened!!! Score!! Maybe my little girl will catch on!! Now I can say WE love this bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larnwine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite dog bed after buying dozens of beds for my ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dog bed after buying dozens of beds for my great dane for 7 years. Still comfortable for my great dane despite her size. Easily washable cover. The size availability is perfect. After a year or more, it's still reasonably priced where you can toss it out and get a new one without thinking twice about it. We got a few years use out of our last one and now we bought a new one. Awesome for the back of the SUV when we're out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not last for adolescent dog
customer_reviews.text: Not durable for young big dogs. Mine chewed it too quickly. This should be good for older, more calm dogs. The cover is not suitable for machine wash. The fuzz will come off and makes mess in a launders machine. Take a long time to clean the laundry machine. Don’t even think about putting it in the dryer. Nightmare it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Alexander
customer_reviews.text: It is a large bed and fluffy though not 8in thick. It starts to shed when you wash it so expect “fuzzies” everywhere and the internal pillows don’t hold up well. Our 2 Great Danes love to share the 2XL though and prefer this to other beds. It gets 4 stars because of how our dogs show preference to this bed over others throughout our home otherwise I would’ve capped at 3 for lack of machine wash durability.
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: the material isn't great quality. It has been in the trash since ...
customer_reviews.text: I know now why this was so affordable for the size...the material isn't great quality. It has been in the trash since 2 weeks after purchasing. The cover tears up and can be chewed up easily leaving access to the inside bed which you can tear that lining easily too. My dog can't destroy other pet beds I've purchased elsewhere, even beds from CVS, but this was so bad I could tear it up myself with my hands. Very disappointed that I pretty much threw my money in the trash. Had this been made with higher quality material, it would've been loved.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! We have a rather smelly dog that has a knack for destroying expensive beds pretty quickly. This bed has been great. It really is resistant to liquids on the inside "fluff" and comes apart to be washed very easily! It has so far stood up to her smelliness and washes well. The only negative is the water-proof material does make a crinkling sound when she lays on it or moves, but that is a very minor trade-off for a bed that will last much longer than the others we have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea L.

customer_reviews.title: This product is a good price for the size
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good price for the size. My dog didn't like it at first because the plastic lining makes a crunchy noise when he steps on it, but now that he as gotten used to it, he loves it and definitely prefers it over his old Costco bed. My only complaint with it is when I wash it, it sheds like crazy and makes a mess around my house for a couple of days. When you take the cover off and then put it back on, make sure to put the insert right side up, one side is waterproof, one side is not.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Save money - buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one each for my lab and lab mix (who has bad hips). I like that the covers are soft and washable, but they are nowhere near as cushiony as I had hoped. The lab has used it twice in one week, and the lab mix will use it only if the floor is the alternative. I could either stack and stitch them together or supplement the stuffing, but that shouldn’t be a necessity when they’re touted as being very cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: To soft and sinks to floor
customer_reviews.text: Super soft bed. So soft its like every other cheap dog bed. Looks good in pics, dog gets on it and sinks to the floor. Cheap price but dont waste the money. Eveyone claiming they have 100+ lb dogs on it comfortable.....BS. Just spend the money and get the better quality more durable thicker bed for your pup
customer_reviews.author: Mike Murray

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the bed. She could have gotten by with a smaller size but she’s stretched out to use it all. My review. The zipper broke after taking the cover off to wash. Not too happy about that. And second, the inside makes ampladtic noise when she moves around. She doesn’t care the dipper is broke but the next time I want to wash it will never close again. Need to let manufacturer know. I’d like another fiver.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S.

customer_reviews.title: It was great. The top was super soft and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great. The top was super soft and easy to put together. My only complaint is that the package came folded in half so the bed doesn't have equal filling & that the filling isn't real thick. My dog has bad legs so I think I am going to buy some foam for support but it is a great size. My 18 lb dog has plenty of room to lie in it. My dog is a cocker spaniel /pekingese mix if it helps anyone realize how big the bed is. *Edited- I just washed the entire bed and the filling fluffed up and works a lot better now.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: I've finally found a great product, this is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the best bed I ve ever bought. It is well made, durable and holds upwell. . Cleaning the co ver is easy and once cleaned it still looks and "beha es" like new. Replacing the Clea ed cover is easy enough because the inner mattress is segmented into 3 compartments so you can fold the mattress to insert it into the cover then open each section then zip the cover right up, give it a couple of good shakes to distribute the mattress filler equally and you're set. It's perfect for my aging GSD and sustains her 130 lb. Weight. Love, love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S.

customer_reviews.title: ... order came on time and the Dog bed looks great! My Dog however seems very uncomfortable on it ...
customer_reviews.text: The order came on time and the Dog bed looks great! My Dog however seems very uncomfortable on it and it makes crinkle sounds when she moves. The padding is nice and soft but has a seam thru the middle which makes it like two poofy pillows are sewn together, so when she tries to stretch out on it, it almost looks like her body forms into a V instead of nice and straight. The bed is also slippery and she slides of during the night. She is definitely not as comfortable as the dog in the picture!
customer_reviews.author: elfie

customer_reviews.title: Took months for my dog to destroy this one!
customer_reviews.text: First things first...my dog is a CHEWER. Our dog is such an aggressive chewer, that we can only purchase Kong toys for him (as they are the only ones that he cannot eat within a day). He has also taken a liking to chewing his mat (usually within 3 days of purchasing). This mat though-it was so comfy that my dog DID NOT want to destroy it! On multiple occasions, he chose to sleep on this mat for hours when he wasn't crated. This mat has lasted my dog 4 months, and I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: rlzakutansky

customer_reviews.title: There were really nice when new and if you have a trained dog ...
customer_reviews.text: There were really nice when new and if you have a trained dog (which the one we got isn't yet), they are probably fantastic. Only one side of the inner pillow is waterproof which makes it not waterproof (maybe not advertised as such). Zipping and unzipping just a few times and washing the cover twice made the zipper and material no longer connected everywhere. We bought two and threw them away after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie M.

customer_reviews.title: This is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This size dog bed is very hard to find, and when you do, it's super expensive! This dog bed is perfect for Giant Breed dogs, (or grandkids) I have a 165lb Great Dane, she is far from small. My dog looks small on this bed! She climbed right on the minute I put the cover on it, and she LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression from the pictures and description that this would be some sort of orthopedic type of mattress for my old dog. When opened I realized it resembles 2 large fluffy pillows laid side by side in an over sized pillow case which I could of made for cheaper in my home. The only reason I will not return is because once down with an extra comforter folded on top of this item its comfy enough for my 9 year old with stiff legs to sleep on until the pillows flatten out. At which time I will search for a new bed with a different company.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth morris

customer_reviews.title: I like the overall appearance and size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for a greyhound because it was the largest one I could find that wasn't outrageously priced. It's okay, but nothing special. I like the overall appearance and size. My main complaint is that the padding it a lot less supportive than I'd hoped- it's basically like a cheap pillow. My dog seems to like it well enough, but I wouldn't buy this for an older dog that needs a better bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ariz_Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pet bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these 7 years ago. After getting another puppy, I needed another for his crate and was thrilled to see they were still available. Cover washes easily and the cushion inside is contained in a waterproof/ water resistant cover! It fits nice and snug in the dog’s crate.
customer_reviews.author: pp02

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok product but Not what I expected. There is only one side of the cushion cover that is "waterproof" and the cushions do not separate so you can not wash them. They are not very full so ultimately it's not that comfortable for big dogs. The purpose of buying such a big bed was to accommodate both of my Bouviers. Ultimately, I had to spend more $$ and add padding to make it remotely comfortable for them.
customer_reviews.author: ruby bryant

customer_reviews.title: Cushion sewn in half!?!?
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick and cushy, and my border collie sleeps on it. However, when it arrived I assumed it would be folded in half for shipping, but to my surprise it is SEWN in half. So it ends up being 2 cushions instead of one. BIG gap in the middle where the cushion(s) is side by side. Not what I expected at all. However, since the dog doesn’t seem to mind I kept it. But that’s why I only gave it 3 stars. Had it been one big cushion I would have given it 5.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice for dogs who don’t power chew.
customer_reviews.text: This was really soft, but my dog was a power chewer and destroyed this thing within a month. After nipping at the stitching, the stuffing started coming out and my dog thought it was a game to see how much he could pull out in a day. Not a fun game. I did try and wash it a few times after a few accidents, which turned out okay, but the last time it came out a little lumpy. Could be because the stuffing had started coming out. Really soft though.
customer_reviews.author: Bushen

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed. I have a miniature Beagle and a mini Doberman mix. It is very soft and easily assembled. As soon as I had them put together both dogs were laying on them. I don't know how they will wash up yet. But I think it'll be fine. If not I'll add an addendum to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This is also a very stylish looking bed because of the grand size and beautiful color. I will have to say that our ...
customer_reviews.text: This plush dog bed is truly a hit with our three dogs!!! The fur on top is very soft and luscious. This is also a very stylish looking bed because of the grand size and beautiful color. I will have to say that our dogs are a small breed that do not weigh much. With a larger dog, the bed might be a bit flat. One of our mishevious dogs had an accident on this bed but luckily, the top layer of the stuffing cover is water proof. I highly recommend this bed for dogs that appreciate a comfortable nap.
customer_reviews.author: CDHB

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a second for our new dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes this bed - but it's not very firm so she has a hard time getting up out of it. She's an older shepherd mix with hip and knee problems so we had hoped that it would be a little firmer. That being said, we just rescued a younger dog and ordered the same bed for her and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MomofFourinFFX

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my dog because I wanted him to have plenty of room to spread out. I have a 67lb Boxer and he has more than enough room on this bed. As a matter of fact, two boxers have fit on this bed! It's durable and comfortable and this is his spot when he naps during the day. I've taken the cover off and washed it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: My little old man loves his new bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 smaller dogs that are starting to get older than I would like them to be. 1 of my 2 puppies has hip and joint issues making it uncomfortable for him to lay down on a hard surface or a pile of blankets made into a bed. As soon as I put this bed in his cage, he jumped in and plopped down and looked as happy as ever! I could tell he was finally able to relax and sleep pain-free! I have noticed some flattening where he likes to lay down, but some occasional fluffing of the bed fixed that tiny issue. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Goralski

customer_reviews.title: not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: maybe I didn't read carefully enough. This is made of "poly fill" that's packed into the case. It doesn't provide the support that's needed (it basically just squishes down so the dog is laying on the floor). When the dog isn't laying it, it's 5 inches thick. But when the dog is one it, it compresses down to like 1 inch. I'm returning it. I need a solid memory foam dog bed. I also immediately noticed that the moisture barrier on the top of the fill case is very loud and crinkly.
customer_reviews.author: Macrends

customer_reviews.title: Our very large dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: Our very large dog really loves this. We have 4 of them (he's approx 150lbs and not overweight). They aren't the easiest to clean (take apart and wash) but given how much he enjoys these, we're happy to do it. Thanks for a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: dmvrlv

customer_reviews.title: This is the one. And good price. I bought twice so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The filling will wear down like pillows do. Easy to wash cover. I replaced the internal with strong pillows from Walmart when I had to. After a year and a half I went ahead and bought a new one for biggie. He’s hitting 100lbs and I’m trying to make sure he has comfortable places to lay so when he gets old his body is not so bad from laying only on hard places.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carignan

customer_reviews.title: Basically a giant pillow with a resilient cover.
customer_reviews.text: My dalmatian fits on this bed well. The filling flattens outs almost immediately, maybe retained cushion for three days. A dense foam base under the filling would be ideal to maintain the plushness while providing support off the ground. It seems my dog prefers his other foam bed over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have noted, the bed is soft to the point that if u push on it, your hand will go right to the floor. So it’s not very firm. That said, it’s a very good size and our pit mix absolutely loves it. She didn’t need to be told twice that this was her bed and she happily sleeps or just lounges on it
customer_reviews.author: bkl121

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I have a service dog and so she is by my side everywhere. I have one bed for living room and one in my office for her to be comfortable while she is watching after me. Easy to wash little challenging getting the inner pad back in the first time but after that super easy. i use saddle blanket over the bed so i don't have to wash them as often. My child likes to lay on the bed with the dog and read. Size wise the large just fits my chocolate lab. I have a extra large one and that gives her much more stretching out room and room to have a chew toy or two with her.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: I added an old comforter which is perfect. I can take it out and wash it
customer_reviews.text: This is very big and cozy. I don't know some ppl say it's hard to stuff or have complaints about this product. Yes, because it is so big there is plenty of room to add stuffing. I added an old comforter which is perfect. I can take it out and wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big, but a breathing hazard. The cover is washable but after it's gone in a dryer (low hear of course) you pull out the product along with anything that was washed and dried with out so covered in the finest polyester fuzz ever!!! It is so fine it gets up your nose, your dogs nose, clings to anything your wearing and would be extremely unsafe around a child. Don't buy this dog bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Only beds our dogs like
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these beds for the last 6 years. We used these for our 150 and 200 pound mastiffs up until the day they passed. They were always very supportive for such large dogs and our mastiffs love them. Now we have a 2 year old lab and a 4 month old pointer and they too love these beds. They are very supportive and soooo worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bartshe

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I got the XL for my 90# American Bulldog. It's bigger than I expected, but in a good way. He absolutely loves it! The light top helps keep it from looking dirty all the time. It has quite a bit of stuffing for inside and just looks super comfortable. I found the price to be a good value, making this an easy decision to buy. I strongly recommend to anyone considering.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: really large! great cover
customer_reviews.text: The outside cover is awesome.. well made with rubbery nubs on the bottom so it does not slide.. the top is super soft and comfy.. Inside it has three fairly thin pillows sewn side by side ... not really a lot of fluff or bulk....very large and perfect for large dog or two or three medium size dogs. A little noisy inside due to the vinyl like material that holds the three pillows laid out side by side. I will update this after a week or so of the two dogs sleeping on it to see how well it stays fluffed... This is not memory foam inside.. it is something like foam pieces that are sparce.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Bed for Large Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, Tito, is on the large size! He weighs between 90-95 pounds. We were finding it hard to find a reasonable, comfortable bed for the ole boy. Well, this one has worked just right for "Moose"!! We and he have been very pleased with the product and service we received.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Great pet bed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement dog bed, along with a smaller size as well by Armakat. I was concerned about the loose fill as compared to an egg crate style foam that our dogs have been using. Well our dogs absolutely love this bed, and the fill is sufficient to provide support and comfort. Others have commented on the noise from the waterproof liner surrounding the loose fill, but its not an issue for our family. We like the fact the cover is removable and can be washed. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Zipper construction is crap
customer_reviews.text: The cover is cheesy and the zipper very poor quality . The actual inside Matt is not firm, it's like a poofy lawn chair cushion. I bought two of these and already threw out one of the covers after the one washing. And what's worse is that Amazon does not carry the replacement covers. I would throw it all away except my dog loves the fake fur on the cover. Truly she loves the fake fur on this cover.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed :) beautifully packaged; lovely, durable material; and you can actually turn the bed over. Texture of bed is great- three large cushions fit nicely into the gorgeous zippered protective cover- washable.. .I added my own cover (a large sheet) to protect the bed.. It is the perfect size for my extra large dog- 115 lbs. Mastiff..... WOW could not believe how terrific this bed is and a great value. Would highly recommend it. It is soft and conforms to the dog's body. ******* EXCELLENT BUY....
customer_reviews.author: It. Mas

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the largest bed and im so pleased. I feel like this bed is worth way ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the largest bed and im so pleased. I feel like this bed is worth way more than i actually paid for it. It did have that crazy crease in the middle but my dog loved it still. I love the bed itself is water proof. My lab is 110 pounds and Beagle 37 and me 5'9 135 pounds can lay on it and be comfy. Plus my 2 cats haha. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Relaxed
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of days for dog to accustom herself to the rustling sound when she stepped on it. Comfort won out, however. Have to say I find myself envying her sometimes - she can look soooo relaxed. I would suggest considering one size larger than you think you'll need. Almost bought the next one down and, while she'd fit, I can't really say how long it'd have taken her to adjust
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pancake Bed to Overstuffed Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is decent. The only complaint I have is it goes flat and now my dog is basically sleeping on the hard ground, but it's typical of these types of beds with a 50 lb + puppy. The quality of the liner is great. I actually wound up purchasing foam from the craft store and stuffing it in the liner along with the cushion that was included. Now it's perfect. My puppy was immediately thrilled with her overstuffed bed and I feel better knowing she isn't on the hard ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kymber R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed! Huge!!
customer_reviews.text: Just for reference, I'm 5'5 and this is my 7 months old Great Dane, he was about 85 lbs when this picture was taken, he's about 120 lbs now at 9 months old and we can both fit on this bed! It's huge and is made of wonderful material, simply take off the cover and wash and it comes out white again, also doesn't absorb water or dirt and I've had it about 9 months now and still looks brand new! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review for the 39L x 28W rectangular pet bed. It has a non-skid water resistant bottom with red canvas along the sides and a super plush top. The cover is removable and washable. There are 2 pillows folded within the box. I was worried it would make a dent in the middle, but the way the pillows are attached together prevents this from happening. My husky loves this bed; she didn't need much convincing to lay on it. I hope my guys won't fight over it. I may need to get another one...
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Just ok but the dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a bit thin and I'm not sure how durable it will be. The cushion has a waterproof cover which I like but it's platic like and noisy. The cushion is also three separate pieces attached to each other and it sinks down between them but it also keeps the filling from moving around too much. Not a bad product but I'd probably choose a different one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bowers

customer_reviews.title: the cover is nice but the insides are nowhere near orthopedic they took ...
customer_reviews.text: the cover is nice but the insides are nowhere near orthopedic they took 3 cheap Walmart pillows and sewed them in 3 plastic bags you are to put inside the nice covering. which might have fooled my dog if it didn't crinkle every time she got near it so in closing she prefers the floor to this bed.
customer_reviews.author: pixels rose

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a pretty awesome dog bed. It is extremely comfortable for my puppy to lay on. She even bites at it (teething) and has not opened this up yet to get to the inside yet, which is a really good thing considering shes able to tear up other things that seem more durable. The only thing is that the size is accurate, and since my breed will be getting bigger, this will not fit her. Keep that in mind when purchasing! I would say this is for a small to medium size dog, maximum probably 40-50lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor N. Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fully washable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fully washable, proper thickness to make it comfortable. Nice size for our large 2-dog kennel. I appreciate that the filling is not foam egg crate material because our dogs scratch their bedding and circle before lying down, and egg crate foam can't withstand that treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, just got it delivered yesterday
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, just got it delivered yesterday. The set up was quick, and I got an XL to fit both my pups and they basically have half the room for another pup! Both my girls weigh about 60-65 pounds each so getting a large bed was pretty critical for me since they can't lay w/o each other. I just wish it didn't crinkle so much, but it's not a big deal since it's not kept in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mdubbz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived defective. The zipper on the cover was broken. the tab used to pull the zipper up and down fell off Photo shows the damaged zipper on the cover. I read the reviews on all kinds of dog beds and thought I had choosen a good quality product. Maybe this was just a one time issue..not sure.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: The plastic liner crinkles when you touch the bed! ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic liner crinkles when you touch the bed! Dogs are terrified of it! When I forced them on to it the noise every time they even slightly moved drove me crazy! picked one up at sams club for the same money and it was 10 times the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Booth

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed E-V-E-R
customer_reviews.text: Love * Love * Love * this bed! Finally a dog bed that fits my dog's crate. Not only is the size perfect but it is beautiful and plush. My dog is 7 y.o. and 110# and this, hands down, is the best dog bed I have ever bought for him. On top of how amazing it is, the price was affordable. I highly recommend this dog bed. In fact, I loved it so much that I ordered a smaller one for my cat
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful bed
customer_reviews.text: My bulldog was diagnosed with arthritis and mild dysplasia at a youge age of 10 months, so want to make him as comfortable as possible. This bed fits perfecly in my his crate leaving a nice area for a food bowl. At first he barked at it and wouldn't go close to it, until I crawled in there with him... Dang!! Heck, I'd sleep on it! Now, he loves it and I have piece of mind that he sleeps well and is relaxed. I plan on getting the jumbo so we can both share to watch TV. Would highly recommend this bed. He loves it!! 🐶 ❤
customer_reviews.author: David G. Yocum Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bed for my 15yr old dog
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this bed before and my dog loved it but unfortunately had to get rid of it. I bought another bed off amazon for older dogs and she destroyed it. So I bought this one again, the second the box was delivered it’s like she knew it was her bed. The second I put it down she just laid down and was so happy I got her this bed again. What’s so perfect about this bed is that it’s basically indestructible.. I will never get a different bed again.
customer_reviews.author: victoria jones

product_meta.title: Armarkat Pet Bed Mat, Ivory
product_meta.description: Size:Extra Large| Color:IvoryPet Bed: M02HJH MB X; heavy duty canvas and Soft Plush with waterproof and skid free base. Filled with extra thick 100-percent poly fill for maximum comfort; Zippered opening for easy cover removal waterproof lining for easy cleaning; Machine washable; Color: Burgundy and Ivory; Size: Extra Large; Dimensions: 49-inch L x 35-inch W x 8-inch H
feature_bullets: heavy duty canvas and Soft Plush with waterproof and skid free base
Zippered opening for easy cover removal waterproof lining for easy cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
